plot: Alyson Clark, daughter of a deceased super hero must solve the mysteries that have appeared in her community. With the help of her new friends, they band together and fight the evils that plague her community.
plot_en: Alyson Clark, daughter of a deceased super hero must solve the mysteries that have appeared in her community. With the help of her new friends, they band together and fight the evils that plague her community.
plot_es: Alyson Clark, daughter of a deceased super hero must solve the mysteries that have appeared in her community. With the help of her new friends, they band together and fight the evils that plague her community.
title: Avery Park
